entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Test failure when AOT'ed with SIMD support - `JSException : TypeError: globalThis.WebSocket is not a constructor` #75098
  • [wasm] Add Vector128.Min and Max for WebAssembly #75094
    8.0.0
  • Various Runtime assert failures on both Windows and Linux #75091
  • IConfiguration.GetValue<T>() is no longer defined in .NET 6 #75089
  • Erroneous leading space in ShortTimePattern and LongTimePattern in Burmese Cultures ({my} and {my-MM}) #75087
  • Grpc.Net.Common .NETStandard is missing "Grpc.Net.Compression.DeflateCompressionProvider" #75086
  • [wasm] Add Vector128 Dot and Sum intrinsics on WebAssembly #75084
    8.0.0
  • sendtohelixhelp.proj always includes openssl as a Helix correlation payload #75080
    8.0.0
  • Kestrel TLS handshake fails for every 2nd request when specifying the ClientCertificateMode.AllowCertificate option on Linux with .NET 7 #75079

Closed

  • ubsan discovers out of bounds array access in runtime/src/native/external/libunwind/src/aarch64/Ginit.c #74390
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\SIMD\\VectorDot_r\\VectorDot_r.cmd #74913
  • Unused variable addrCostSzDelta in gentree.cpp #75071
  • AV in GetITypeInfoForMT #75035
    7.0.0
  • standard2.0 Type.IsAssignableFrom not work #74700
  • NCL stress tests fail to build since ProductVersion update to 8.0.0 #74604
    8.0.0
  • Cache Task.FromResult(String.Empty) or Task.FromResult("") #75077
  • Assertion failed 'isGeneralRegister(reg3)' #74117
    7.0.0
  • native build, missing meta exception #75053
  • [mono] Tests failed on windows: System.Net.*.Tests #34690
    Future
  • NET7 Int128, UInt128 - bugs in ToString #75072
  • Nullability annotation missing on CacheControlHeaderValue.TryParse #74061
    8.0.0
  • There is room for improvement in the performance of the Stream.Write #75076
  • Utf8JsonWriter.WriteCommentValue() method overloads behavior differently #75075
  • [Tests] System.Net.Quic.Tests System.Exception : Failed to create MsQuicApi instance #74952
    7.0.0
  • Question: finding architecture using System.Reflection.Metadata #74040
  • Requesting a net35 target for the S.R.Metadata package #25198
    Future
  • Does CoreFX library support NI file, including both FNV and R2R ? #23487
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Initialization failures logging #75097
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use analyzers from targeting pack for NetCoreAppCurrent #75093
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] fix prefetch in samples #75092
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Race in init_method when using LLVM AOT. #75088
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, runtime-mono, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Enable DOTNET_JitStdOutFile in Release #75085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Enable HTTP & SSL stress runs on release/7.0 #75082
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Fix unrecognized unaligned field indirections on ARM32 #75078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior. #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix undefined behavior issues in aarch64 #75029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix W^X flag for setting `ITypeInfo` #75045
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix typo in gentree.cpp #75081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix NCL stress tests after ProductVersion upgrade #75026
    area-System.Net
  • Remove duplicate SourceGeneration generator refs #75083
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Avoid allocations in ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync in the common case #75025
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Enable a bunch of System.Net tests on Windows #75010
    area-System.Net
  • Add nullability annotation on CacheControlHeaderValue #74863
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add missing documentation to System.Net.Quic and System.Net.WebSockets #74945
    area-System.Net
  • Use ConfigureAwait(false) #74982
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix SharedLibrary smoke test build on osx-arm64 #74989
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Floor and Ceiling intrinsics for amd64 #74936
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] add simd testing on ci #75064
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix W^X flag for setting `ITypeInfo` #75046
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 SQRT intrinsics for amd64 #74865
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add guard word before local var CMiniColDef[9] #73736
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] SIMD related build fixes #75042
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [SocketException]: New Constructor with string? for SocketException #74744
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update Roslyn compiler build #75058
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Change LibrariesConfiguration defaults in tests #75033
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix Mono Windows x86 build and runtime crash. #74639
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, runtime-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Throw on incompatible WebSocket options #75014
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Encode UserName value in UriBuilder (Issue #74662) #74953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Rewrite interop in debugger tests #74990
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Disable TYP_BLK stressing for tail call to loop optimization #74999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Optimize the performance of InternalConfigurationRootExtensions.GetChildrenImplementation #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix distribute free regions #74916
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74762
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #74669
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/7.0] [mono][jit] Zero extend the return when we might be invoking llvm generated code #74991
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
